meanings.definition: To swallow eagerly or in large amounts
meanings.sent1: He gulps down his water after playing outside.
meanings.sent2: She always gulps her food when she's hungry.
meanings.sent3: The thirsty dog gulps the water from his bowl noisily.
meanings.sent4: The runner gulps in the fresh air after a long race.
meanings.sent5: The baby gulps his milk happily before bedtime.

meanings.definition: A large amount of liquid swallowed at once
meanings.sent1: She took big gulps of the refreshing lemonade.
meanings.sent2: The hiker drank the cool water in large gulps.
meanings.sent3: The fish in the pond took quick gulps of the water.
meanings.sent4: The engine needed gulps of oil to keep running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The plant absorbed the rain in big gulps to grow tall.
